indicators.questionText: The following lesson features were observed:

answerOptions.optionText: Teacher models instructional tasks when appropriate.
Students are engaged in the lesson during teacher-led instruction.
Students are engaged in lesson during independent work.
Students are successful in completing tasks at a high level of performance.
Students have multiple opportunities to practice skills.
Objective for the lesson is clear and articulated.
